statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -6 \\ 4 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 30 \\ 27 \\ -12 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ 6 \\ 14 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
